about_the_game:
! Local multiplayer game - No singleplayer !
Play with up to 16 players on 8 controllers against each other!
No one has to wait until he or she can play, share one controller with 2 people and have fun.
Jump into the game and get access to 16 amazing mini games!
Play the games:
Football
Play in a team and shoot the ball in the enemy goal
Classic
Do not touch the wall - otherwise you die. So try to shoot the others out of the ring but be careful - the controls are hard to master!
Race
Get to the target as fast as possible
Bombay
Try to bring the bombs in the others players areas. But be careful that your area is safe!
Survive
Avoid the dangerous bakterias
Safe Space
Avoid the black areas. When they start to blink and your on it - you die!
Team shooter
Shoot the enemy team for victory!
Hunter
Get bigger by collecting the yellow rings. When you are bigger than someone else you steal one life from them!
Classic +
Like Classic but faster and with more lifes
Shooter
Shoot the others with the projectiles
Copter Classic
Fly in a randomly generated track and do not touch the wall or the obstacles
Copter Race
Fly faster than the others - try to avoid the wall or the obstacles, otherwise you will be slowed down and when you are to slow - you die!
Spike
Fast paced game where you get spikes by sticking to the platforms. When you are spiky you can shoot yourself on the others to kill them
Drift
Race as fast as possible with cool drifting controls and shoot the others to slow them down
Simple Rick
Simple game - simply click in the right time
Drift Shoot
Try to shoot the others with the drift controls
Team Drift Shoot
Try to shoot the other team with the drift controls
